title: Track Referral Status
description: A care coordinator needs to check if a patient ever scheduled their appointment with the specialist they were referred to.

tasks.description: Find the referral order in the patient's chart.
tasks.expected_outcome: The coordinator locates the original referral.

tasks.description: Check the status of the referral.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system shows the referral status is still 'Sent', not 'Scheduled' or 'Completed'.

tasks.description: Create a task to call the patient to help them schedule the specialist appointment.
tasks.expected_outcome: The coordinator identifies a gap in care and takes action to close it.
